Requesting a national ID when opening a bank account helps protect both the bank and the customer by ensuring compliance with regulations, preventing fraud, and enhancing security.
I have read & understood and accept the terms and conditions of the service, and I allow the service provider to scan my national ID and save it and use it securely for the provided services.
Verification of identity: A national ID is a reliable and standardized form of identification that helps banks verify the identity of the account holder.
Compliance with regulations: Banks are required to comply with various regulations, such as anti-money laundering (AML) and know your customer (KYC) rules.

Enhanced security: By requesting a national ID, banks can enhance the security of their customers\' accounts. It helps protect against unauthorized access and ensures that only the account holder can perform transactions.
Prevention of financial crimes: A national ID can help banks in their efforts to prevent financial crimes, such as money laundering, terrorist financing, and tax evasion.

Streamlined processes: Requesting a national ID helps banks streamline their account opening processes. It provides a standardized and easily verifiable form of identification, making it easier for banks to verify customer information and complete the necessary paperwork.
Please scan the front side of the ID
Please scan the back side of the ID
Before start, please follow this tips
Ensure to take off your cap in case you are wearing it.
Ensure to take off your glasses in case you are wearing it.
